mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title},content=#{content}, fileName=if(isnull(#{fileName}),fileName,#{fileName}), file_id= if(isnull(#{file_id}),file_id,#{file_id}) where notiNo=#{notiNo}
update notice set hits=hits+1 where notiNo=#{notiNo}
